mapper.insert: insert into tbl_movie(movie_code, movie_name, movie_genre, movie_director, movie_actor, movie_open_date, movie_total_time, movie_main_image, movie_regist_date, movie_grade, movie_preview, movie_num) values('MC' || seq_movie_num.nextval, #{movie_name}, #{movie_genre}, #{movie_director}, #{movie_actor}, to_date(#{movie_open_date},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{movie_total_time}, #{movie_main_image}, to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{movie_grade}, #{movie_preview}, seq_movie_num.nextval)
